short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that redirects any YouTube Shorts™ video to a normal YouTube video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redirects YouTube Shorts™ videos to the standard format YouTube video player, which has a better UX on desktop.

YouTube Shorts is a trademark of Google LLC. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
